0: Theranos Inc. said it will shut down its blood-testing facilities and shrink its workforce by more than 40%. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The moves mark a dramatic retreat by the Palo Alto, Calif., company and founder Elizabeth Holmes from their core strategy of offering a long menu of low-price blood tests directly to consumers. Those ambitions already were endangered by crippling regulatory sanctions that followed revelations by The Wall Street Journal of shortcomings in Theranos’s technology and operations.
